ValidationRule.description: Prevents any user from changing investor type of an existing PFG Investor. To update the field deactrivate the validation rule first
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(OR( ISCHANGED( Investor_Type__c )),
PFG_Total_Raised_Capital__c >0) && ($UserRole.Name <> "PFG Salesforce Support" && $UserRole.Name <> "PFG Salesforce Support Team")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Changing Investor Type of an existing Investor may have impact in reporting. Please contact PFGSalesforce@brookfield.com for any assistance.
